name: Selfie Kings
description:
Selfie Kings is a text game that uncovers the deeply rooted human instinct: a desire to take life-and-death selfies.

Thank you for looking at it. This is my first game and I'm dying to know if it's any good. So, please get in touch: comments below, website, email, whatever you're most comfortable with. Let me know whether you liked it!

Please support Selfie Kings by sharing this page with your friends, the media, dogs, homeless people or any combination of the above.
